titleStmt.title: John Byrch clerke to the ryghte excellent Doctor in Phisike Andrewe Borde
titleStmt.author: Byrch, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: in Pater noster rowe at the sygne of our Lady pytye by John Redman for Rycharde bankes,

notesStmt.note: At foot of title page: Cum Priuilegio Regali ad imprimendum solum.
Verse - "As I chaunced for to walke, for my ... cyon".
Oa copy, reel 2021, is a fragment.
Reproduction of original in the All Souls College Library.

place.placeName: Pater noster rowe at the sygne of our Lady pytye
